query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Poscia che ’ncontro a la vita presente 2 d’i miseri mortali aperse ’l vero 3 quella che ’mparadisa la mia mente,

query.result: 1 Tataḥ paścāt sammukham asya jīvanasya 2 duritakṣayāṇām martyānāṃ prakāśitam satyam 3 yat svargam cakāra mama manasaḥ,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 come in lo specchio fiamma di doppiero 5 vede colui che se n’alluma retro, 6 prima che l’abbia in vista o in pensiero,
query.error: **English:** 4 like the flame of a candle in a mirror 5 is seen by one who lights it from behind, 6 before he sees it or thinks of it,
query.result: 4 yathā darpaṇe dopakalikāyāḥ jvālā 5 paśyati saḥ yaḥ paścāt tad ādadhe, 6 pūrvam yāvat na paśyati na vā cintayati,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 così la mia memoria si ricorda 11 ch’io feci riguardando ne’ belli occhi 12 onde a pigliarmi fece Amor la corda.
query.error: **English:** 10 so my memory recalls 11 that I looked into the beautiful eyes 12 from which Love fashioned the cord to capture me.
query.result: 10 evam mama smṛtiḥ smarati 11 yathā mama dṛṣṭiḥ āsid netra-dvaye sundare 12 yataḥ mām gṛhītum Kāmaḥ pāśam cakāra.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 13 Evaṃ ca mama parāvṛtte sati ca mama cakṣuṣī 14 Sparśitau tāt tataḥ yaḥ prakāśate tad granthapustake, 15 Yāvad yasya paribhramaṇe samyak avalokyate,

16 un punto vidi che raggiava lume 17 acuto sì, che ’l viso ch’elli affoca 18 chiuder conviensi per lo forte acume;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 19 and as a star appears smaller from here, 20 it would seem like the moon, placed with it 21 as a star is placed with a star.
query.result: 19 Evaṃ ca yathā atra kṣudra iva kaścid grahaḥ prakāśate, 20 Sa eva candra iva prakāśeta, sthitaḥ tasya sārdham 21 Yathā graheṇa grahaḥ evaṃ sthitaḥ syāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 31 Above followed the seventh so spread out 32 in width that Juno's messenger 33 would be too narrow to contain it.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

106 e dei saper che tutti hanno diletto 107 quanto la sua veduta si profonda 108 nel vero in che si queta ogne intelletto.

query.prompt:

query.error: **English:** 127 These orders are all admired from above, 128 and they conquer from below so much that toward God 129 all are drawn and all draw.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
